title: Added changelogs!
description: Added the ability to see changelogs using the ?changelog command!

title: Changed ?move behaviour
description: Added the ability to search for channels by their name, instead of the dodgy mentioning by ID

title: Removed ?tell command
description: Removed the tell command as it can be used to make the bot pretty much say anything :D

title: Fixed ping command
description: Ping command now doesn't display all the weird numbers at the end

title: Improve eval command
description: Prevent exposing tokens in the eval command

title: Add support for command aliases!
description: Long overdue, but there's now a way for me to easily implement alises to certain commands!

title: Update documentation
description: New documentation theme, and general ease of use

title: Fix settings command
description: Settings command now *works* again!

title: Allow uploading of logs
description: Allow use of the ?log command to upload the logs to the server for easy access

title: Update changelog command
description: [Comprehensive changelogs aren't so ugly now](https://jambot.jaminit.co.uk/#/changelog)

title: Commands in dms!
description: Certain commands can now be run in dms, hurray!

title: Update changelog command (again!)
description: The changelog command now shows the date of the change!

title: Changelog command updates
description: Little one: changelogs now use discord timestamps

title: Remove autorole
description: Previous the bot gave the role "A role", to users, automatically giving a role out [plays havok](https://i.imgur.com/kucMopA.png) with discord's server verification level. The feature has been removed.

title: Slash commands!
description: I've implemented the basics so slash commands can be used via the bot, most of the commands are not working with slash commands yet, but they will be soon.

title: More slash commands!
description: I've made loadsss more commands work as slash commands now! :D

title: Autorole is back!
description: I improved the way the member role is given out, so the role is given automatically again!

title: Delete logs!
description: ~~They work again~~

title: Improve twitch embeds
description: The overall twitch embed now looks prettier, the timings are also formatted better :)

title: Snipe improvements
description: The snipe command now looks nicer, and works with slash commands!

title: Image command improvements
description: The bot now checks more thoroughly to see if an image URL is actually an image URL, better results!

title: Bug fixes!
description: Loads of bugs have been now fixed, thanks to the wonderful testing by honkserini!

title: Twitch notification improvements!
description: The bot now only notifies for the correct person :D and shows a thumbnail in the embed now :)

title: Allow admins to snipe bot owners
description: Not the peasants though, only admins ;)

title: Lookup command!
description: Works with slash commands now :D and the logic is a licle better

title: Define Command!
description: There's now a little define command, to define any word you'd like!

title: Mute command punishment system revamp!
description: Kick and ban have been improved, unban is now a thing, a mute command is now a thing, and all these commands now can have durations instead of just being perms!

title: Settings upgrade
description: Settings are a lot easier to change now with slash commands!

title: Modlog upgrades!
description: With the help of the settings upgrade, you can now log more events, to seperate channels!

title: Define command updates
description: The define command now uses buttons and select menus to make it easier to use!
